items.name: Gel-X Set (Basic Cuticle Care)
items.description: The Apres Gel-X system focuses on minimal damage and no harsh chemicals. Includes precision cuticle work.

items.name: Acrylic Full Set
items.description: Custom shaped extensions with a durable acrylic overlay and basic cuticle care.

items.name: Structured Gel Manicure
items.description: Durable, glossy, ultra-clean finish with a focus on natural nail health.

items.name: Hard Gel Overlay
items.description: Adds strength and structure to natural nails. Also known as builder gel.

items.name: Acrylic Refill
items.description: Rebalancing of the nail structure for 3+ week growth. Includes cuticle care.

items.name: Manicure Gel
items.description: Classic gel manicure with filing, shaping, and cuticle care.

items.name: Mens Manicure
items.description: Grooming treatment specifically for men, focusing on cleaning and shaping.

items.name: Basic Pedicure
items.description: Warm soak, scrub, nail shaping, and polish. A classic reset.

items.name: Medi-Pedi
items.description: Specialized care for ingrowns, fungal concerns, or thickened nails.

items.name: French Design Add-on
items.description: Timeless white tips or colored french design added to any service.
